subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Davis Love III and three of the 12 players on the United States Ryder Cup squad live in St. Simons, Ga., an island that is home to several championship courses.
snippet: Davis Love III and three of the 12 players on the United States Ryder Cup squad live in St. Simons, Ga., an island that is home to several championship courses.
